entry.title: https://github.com/ugurkocde/IntuneAssignmentChecker
entry.content: This script enables IT administrators to efficiently analyze and audit Intune assignments. It checks assignments for specific users, groups, or devices, displays all policies and their assignments, identifies unassigned policies, detects empty groups in assignments, and searches for specific settings across policies.
